channel.title: [URGENT] People can't connect! [/URGENT] Will ++Rep if possible
channel.description:
Okay guise, basically I can host every other server accept this creative scape base i found, I'm trying to get it online so me and a few friends can explore and edit it (Not for profit good old fun).. I think, although a bit buggy, it is a great server with many fine features.
I myself can connect through local host, but no one else can connect, I CAN HOST OTHER SERVERS PERFECTLY FINE.
I'm just looking for a fix so i can get online, here's what happens when my friend Daniel tries to connect.
[IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx338/mattstrong2010/Image.jpg[/img]
P.S. The login box and Title were changed using "Toms cache suit", this client IS a webclient (ask for the link and i'll pm you it through the forums private message system).

item.title: [URGENT] People can't connect! [/URGENT] Will ++Rep if possible
item.dc:creator: @rosejuice rosejuice
item.description:
@rosejuice wrote:

[quote=“deans1243, post:2, topic:372754”]well you say its a web client so if you uploaded the client.jar strait to your webhost then its not on your ip. u have to jar and sign it with your ip.

if there using a desktop client then im sure you know this but just to cover it, make sure you have it set to your no-ip and the port you forwarded.[/quote]

I have jar signed it, edited the client.java to connect to my no-ip address and port forwarded.

Read full topic
item.source: [URGENT] People can't connect! [/URGENT] Will ++Rep if possible

item.title: [URGENT] People can't connect! [/URGENT] Will ++Rep if possible
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

well you say its a web client so if you uploaded the client.jar strait to your webhost then its not on your ip. u have to jar and sign it with your ip.

if there using a desktop client then im sure you know this but just to cover it, make sure you have it set to your no-ip and the port you forwarded.

Read full topic
